title: Tutorials
content:
Tutorial notes are courtesy of Yuan Shen, and are used with permission.
TUTORIAL NOTES TOPICS Tutorial 1 (PDF) Rule-based systems, search Tutorial 2 (PDF) Games, constraint satisfaction problems Tutorial 3 (PDF) K-nearest neighbors, decision trees, neural nets Tutorial 4 (PDF) Top-down approach to neural nets Tutorial 5 (PDF) Support vector machines, boosting Tutorial 6 (PDF) Probability, Bayes nets, naïve Bayes, model selection
